resources.string: With this text encrypter you can encrypt your text message with AES, which is one of the strongest encryption standard and MD5 hashing

AES 


The most popular, strong and widely adopted symmetric encryption algorithm is the Advanced Encryption Standard(AES). It is found at least six time faster than triple DES.
 
To know how the algorithm works click here

MD5 Hash 


MD5 Message Digest Algorithm, or MD5, is a cryptographic hashing function. It is a part of the Message Digest Algorithm family which was created to verify the integrity of any message or file that is hashed.
 
To know how the algorithm works click here
